resources.string: Camera access is required to take a photo of you.
Centre your face in the oval and get ready to blink
Centre your face without hats, scarfs, glasses or hair coverage. Blink when ready
\"Time\'s up, we couldn\'t take your photo\". How would you like to try again, with auto capture or manual capture\?

Make sure to centre your face in the oval and keep a neutral expression. Then, blink when you\'re ready. \n\n We need a clear view of your face, so don\'t wear a hat, glasses or a scarf. Also, make sure to keep your hair off your face.
Centre your face, keep a neutral facial expression and blink when ready. Don\'t wear a hat, scarf or glasses, and there should be no hair covering your face
No hats, scarves or hair should cover your face
Centre your face, keep a neutral facial expression and don\'t wear a hat, scarf or glasses, and there should be no hair covering your face
Don\'t wear a hat or a scarf, and make sure no hair is covering your face.
